description: A single biodiversity occurrence record aligned with Simple Darwin Core (TDWG Standard 450, version 2023-09-13).

main.description: A biodiversity occurrence record following the Simple Darwin Core standard.

occurrenceID.description: A globally unique identifier for the occurrence record.

basisOfRecord.description: The specific nature of the data record.

license.description: A legal document giving official permission.

rightsHolder.description: Person or organization owning or managing rights.

institutionCode.description: The name or acronym of the institution.

collectionCode.description: The name, acronym, or code identifying the collection.

informationWithheld.description: A description of what information is withheld.

dataGeneralizations.description: A description of actions taken to make the data less specific.

references.description: A related resource that is referenced.

recordedBy.description: Person(s) responsible for recording the occurrence.

recordedByID.description: Persistent identifier(s) of the person(s) who recorded.

organismQuantity.description: A number or enumeration value for the quantity of organisms.

organismQuantityType.description: The type of quantification system used.

sex.description: The sex of the biological individual(s).

lifeStage.description: The age class or life stage at the time of occurrence.

reproductiveCondition.description: The reproductive condition at the time of occurrence.

behavior.description: The behavior shown by the subject at the time of occurrence.

occurrenceStatus.description: Statement about the presence or absence of a taxon.

occurrenceRemarks.description: Comments or notes about the occurrence.

associatedMedia.description: Identifiers (URIs) of media associated with the occurrence.

associatedOccurrences.description: Identifiers of other occurrences associated with this one.

eventRef.description: AT-URI reference to an app.gainforest.dwc.event record.

eventDate.description: The date or date-time during which the occurrence was recorded.

habitat.description: A description of the habitat in which the event occurred.

samplingProtocol.description: The method or protocol used during the event.

samplingEffort.description: The amount of effort expended during the event.

fieldNotes.description: Notes or reference to notes taken in the field.

geodeticDatum.description: The spatial reference system for the coordinates.

coordinateUncertaintyInMeters.description: Horizontal distance from the given coordinates.

country.description: The name of the country or major administrative unit.

countryCode.description: The standard code for the country (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2).

stateProvince.description: The name of the next smaller administrative region than country.

county.description: The full, unabbreviated name of the next smaller administrative region than stateProvince.

municipality.description: The full, unabbreviated name of the next smaller administrative region than county.

locality.description: The specific description of the place.

verbatimLocality.description: The original textual description of the place.

minimumElevationInMeters.description: The lower limit of the range of elevation.

maximumElevationInMeters.description: The upper limit of the range of elevation.

minimumDepthInMeters.description: The lesser depth of a range of depth.

maximumDepthInMeters.description: The greater depth of a range of depth.

gbifTaxonKey.description: GBIF backbone taxonomy key for the identified taxon.

scientificName.description: The full scientific name, with authorship and date if known.

scientificNameAuthorship.description: The authorship information for the scientific name.

kingdom.description: The full scientific name of the kingdom.

phylum.description: The full scientific name of the phylum or division.

class.description: The full scientific name of the class.

order.description: The full scientific name of the order.

family.description: The full scientific name of the family.

genus.description: The full scientific name of the genus.

specificEpithet.description: The name of the species epithet.

infraspecificEpithet.description: The name of the lowest or terminal infraspecific epithet.

taxonRank.description: The taxonomic rank of the most specific name.

vernacularName.description: A common or vernacular name for the taxon.

taxonomicStatus.description: The status of the use of the scientificName.

nomenclaturalCode.description: The nomenclatural code under which the scientificName is constructed.

higherClassification.description: A complete list of taxa names terminating at the rank immediately superior.

identifiedBy.description: Person(s) who assigned the taxon to the occurrence.

identifiedByID.description: Persistent identifier(s) of the person(s) who identified.

dateIdentified.description: The date on which the identification was made.

identificationQualifier.description: A brief phrase qualifying the identification.

identificationRemarks.description: Comments or notes about the identification.

previousIdentifications.description: Previous assignments of names to the occurrence.

dynamicProperties.description: Additional structured data as a valid JSON string.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of record creation in the ATProto PDS.

projectRef.description: AT-URI reference to the organization info record.

siteRef.description: AT-URI reference to the site record.

datasetRef.description: AT-URI reference to a dataset record.

thumbnailUrl.description: URL to a thumbnail image for display.

speciesImageUrl.description: URL to a representative species image.
